Understand the state of your health now - and in the future - to help you make the right choices about your lifestyle.
Improve your current health score now - and help to reduce the risk of developing dementia.
Eating habits
In order for use to help you understand your current health state, please take time to answer all the questions as accurately as possible
A step by step guide to eating clean.
Learn mindfulness techniques to reduce stress and improve your wellbeing and work/study performance.
Complete daily exercise challenges to create a better you!
1. In terms of fruit and vegetables, how many portions a day do you consume on average?
2. Lets think of whole grains (oatmeal, rice, brown bread), how often do you choose these over refined grains (white bread)?
4. How many portions of lean protein (chicken/fish/beans) do you consume per week?
3. How many portions of red meat do you consume a week?
5. Do you usually add salt to your food?
How many cigarettes do you smoke a day?
Have you ever tried to quit?
Would you like to quit?
1. Do you drink alcohol?
2. How often do you drink per month?
4. Has anyone ever approached you in terms of your drinking and suggested you to stop or cut back?
5. Has your drinking ever caused you or someone else a physical injury?
Digital storytelling on stories that shape you - video documentaries and in-depth features on Dementia, latest research, science.
Based on your previous healthcheck we recommend that you take the 10 day exercise challenge.
Level 21
